snippet: Answers to questions about public service loan forgiveness, options for people with private loans who are struggling with their debts and the impact of student loans on debtors' credit score.
abstract: Answers to questions about public service loan forgiveness, options for people with private loans who are struggling with their debts and the impact of student loans on debtors' credit score.

byline.original: By ANDREW MARTIN and RON LIEBER

headline.main: Answers to Your Questions About Student Loans, Part 1
